name: Too Many Chooks
description:
Catch as many eggs as possible to keep the Chooks happy. If you upset the Chooks too much then it's game over! See if you can reveal all 28 Chooks! Feel free to comment with your high score and/or favorite Chook!

My backyard chickens were the inspiration, models, and voice actresses.

Game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40 with the theme "The more you have, the worse it is".
